long_description: With its decorative trim and multiple pockets, the women's Haiku Nimble Shoulder Bag looks stylish yet casual at the same time so you can grab it and go on any impromptu adventure. Faux-leather trim lines the top edges; contrast colors and patterns add eye-catching pop. Main compartment zips closed for security and features an inner slip-in pocket. 5 exterior pockets: 3 zip (including diagonal zip phone pocket) and 2 slip-in. Cross-body strap is detachable and adjustable. Haiku Nimble Shoulder Bag provides an ID holder under the front flap. Made of recycled material.
short_description: With its decorative trim and multiple pockets, the women's Haiku Nimble Shoulder Bag looks stylish yet casual at the same time so you can grab it and go on any impromptu adventure.
